at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.daemon

Class Driver

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.daemon.Driver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component

    class Driver
extends java.lang.Object
implements Component
    Here is the logical driver for the G2021. It uses a hardware dependent hardware driver to access the hardware devices. The main tasks of this class are
    • to create the hardware buffers in the initialization phase,
    • to poll the hardware ports and
    • to route the value changes to the gatherers.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        This method is called, after creating all necessary instances. Here the hardware buffer for all available ports are created.
